title: Pokemon Elysium
description: Modpack for the Pokemon Elysium server, a Cobblemon-focused pack with hints of low-tech steampunk.
body:
## A Smooth Cobblemon Experience

Pokemon Elysium is a Cobblemon-focused modpack designed for the Pokemon Elysium server (https://discord.gg/6KhzjpPhns). Includes a handful of other mods like Farmer's Delight, Supplementaries and Create for variety, and a number of resource packs and addons from the wonderful Cobblemon community. Alongside this is a full suite of performance-enhancing mods like Sodium, Lithium and Starlight, and quality-of-life tweaks designed for the smoothest experience possible. Some server utility mods are also included, encouraging players to work together and build their legacies in teams.


### Licensing
Uses [Structory](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/structory)

Contains [Overimagined Shaders](https://github.com/isuewo/OverimaginedShaders)

Contains VidyaPokeCriesCobblemon by KonohaDaze with [permission](https://imgur.com/a/FTbr5er)

Contains Cobblemon HGSS Soundpack by KonohaDaze  with [permission](https://imgur.com/a/XFO1kgy)

### Partners

The Pokemon Elysium team is partnered with **BisectHosting!** Host your own server through the link below, and use code 'elysium' to get 25% off your first month of hosting!
https://bisecthosting.com/elysium
